summary:
Replace nightingale texture for something more light knight or heavy ranger style :)  
Now you can have this as a standalone version here : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5853
descriptionHtml:
Now you can have this as a standalone version here : [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5853]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5853[/url]

As i always like heavy kind of armor but not to heavy looking, i made this texture of an ARMORED Nightingale and from scratch to look more unique. It\'s male only sorry ladies but you have enough outfit worker out there :)

Added iron helmet replacer by re-textured low level draugr helmet

U can use it to any purpose and as a lot of \"retexturer\" says : If you want to make this stand alone then you can do it (eventually i would like it heavy armour and cowl replaced by low level draugr helmet :)) just credit me if u use it in a mod.

btw this is my first retex :) be nice :) and sorry for my english :)

[url=http://www.doodaboom.com]www.doodaboom.com[/url]
author: DoODABoOM
